channel.title: Item ON npc making you get xp. Need help quickly
channel.description:
ok, so zezima boy told me this is what i wanted to do when i explained it in a verryy nooby way.
I need someone to help me code this...
Use knife on banker, which gives you 50k theiving xp, and 10k cash, also sends a message to say "you robbed the banker".
Can anyone help?
please post to say if you can help then we can talk further.. Thank you alot.

item.title: Item ON npc making you get xp. Need help quickly
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

k rich.

sec.

il get back with the results…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 03:48:00 PM[/size][hr]Done ALL your suggestions, none worked.

still fucked up lol.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 03:51:13 PM[/size][hr]omfg my whole thigns fucked now, anyone got a better source i could start with???

Read full topic
item.source: Item ON npc making you get xp. Need help quickly

item.title: Item ON npc making you get xp. Need help quickly
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You have 1 more bracket then you needed, or you don’t have enough, try adding a bracket under the code, and compile again, if you get it again, delete that bracket, and another bracket.

Read full topic

item.source: Item ON npc making you get xp. Need help quickly

item.title: Item ON npc making you get xp. Need help quickly
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I don’t add anyone on my msn less i’ve known them for awhile, and it’s easy enough as it is.

Add that in case 155

dd:

`Rich’s code would mean if you talk to the NPC you would get the XP and cash if the item is in the inventory. I’m sure there is a way to make Item on NPC. People do it for quests.

Probably, but I haven’t seen it/learned how to do it yet if so, so I just went with that, Lol.

Read full topic
